TopicTitle: [WIP] Real Mission Control Pack -- Need help getting started

Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone!

A few months ago, I discovered that NASA had released a bunch of space utilities as OSS, and I had an idea to implement some of this stuff to make Kerbal even more realistic.

The first step I want to take is to implement MCT (https://github.com/nasa/mct) to work as mission control for KSP. Someone has had a little bit of luck working with it, but he's too busy to keep going at the moment: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75986-Using-NASA-Mission-Control-Software-with-KSP

Eventually, I'd like to grow this into a complete mission control package for KSP and I need a few more modders to help me make this a reality. If you'd like to donate, you can do so here. If you'd like to get involved, I've set up a github org here. Let's make RMCP a reality!
